subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After weeks of speculation, Oklahoma City’s new N.B.A. franchise revealed that the team would be called the Thunder. A group of children and team members pulled down a curtain at a news conference to reveal a large team banner as the AC/DC song “Thunderstruck” was played. Clay Bennett, the team chairman, said the team colors would be blue, red and orange.
